metadata.name: Security Service Disabled Via Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "reg.exe" to disable security services such as Windows Defender.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('d 4')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('v start')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appidsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\msmpsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\nissrv')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\securityhealthservice')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\sense')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\usosvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wdboot')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wdfilter')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wdnisdrv')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wdnissvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\windefend')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wscsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wuauserv'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "reg.exe" to disable security services such as Windows Defender.
